title: El Camino Real de los Tejas National Historic Trail: Mission San Juan Acequia
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia     A Photographic Journey of the Trail     A Photographic Journey - Pictures 1-15     Mission San Juan Acequia                  Mission San Juan Acequia        Christopher Talbot   Â    Mission San Juan Acequia, Bexar County, Texas Listed in the National Register of Historic Places, this acequia (irrigation ditch) is associated with Mission San Juan. Time period: 1700s Ownership: Public (National Park Service) A Photographic Journey of the Trail - NEXT IMAGE PREVIOUS IMAGE
